leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-序列分析与注释生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 采集/解析→QC→比对/组装→注释→评测→工作流

unit.coverage_tools: 读写解析、trim/filter、QC报告、污染检测

queries: [WEB] best fastq trimmer adapter removal github

tools.name: pairsqc
tools.one_line_profile: Quality control report generator for Hi-C pairs files
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by the 4DN DCIC to generate comprehensive quality control reports for Hi-C pairs files, facilitating the assessment of chromatin conformation capture data integrity and quality.

tools.name: SOAPnuke
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated quality control and preprocessing tool for NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool developed by BGI for integrated quality control and preprocessing of high-throughput sequencing data (FASTQ, BAM, CRAM). It supports trimming, filtering, and statistical analysis to ensure data quality for downstream analysis.

tools.name: SeqFilter
tools.one_line_profile: Versatile FASTA/FASTQ sequence file analysis and modification tool
tools.detailed_description: A Perl-based command-line utility for analyzing, filtering, and modifying biological sequence files in FASTA or FASTQ format. It is designed for flexibility in bioinformatics pipelines.

tools.name: FASTX.jl
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance parsing of FASTA and FASTQ files in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A core library in the BioJulia ecosystem for efficient parsing, writing, and processing of FASTA and FASTQ formatted biological sequence files, enabling high-performance bioinformatics analysis in Julia.

tools.name: SanitizeMe
tools.one_line_profile: Host contamination removal tool for sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by the CDC to remove host contaminants from sequencing files, ensuring privacy and data cleanliness for downstream analysis.

tools.name: mim
tools.one_line_profile: Auxiliary index for accelerating parallel FASTQ parsing
tools.detailed_description: A small, auxiliary index structure designed to massively improve the performance of parallel FASTQ parsing, developed by the COMBINE lab.

tools.name: UMICollapse
tools.one_line_profile: Fast deduplication and collapsing for UMI-tagged reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool for accelerating the deduplication and collapsing process for reads with Unique Molecular Identifiers (UMI), optimized for scalability and speed.

tools.name: daylily-ephemeral-cluster
tools.one_line_profile: Automated cloud-based NGS analysis framework for WGS data
tools.detailed_description: An NGS analysis framework that automates the provisioning of AWS EC2 spot instances to process FASTQ data into snvVCFs efficiently and cost-effectively.

tools.name: human_genomics_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for Illumina WGS/WES data processing
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow developed by ESR-NZ to process single samples or cohorts of Illumina paired-end sequencing data using standard tools like Trim Galore, BWA, and GATK.

tools.name: Trim Galore!
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for Cutadapt and FastQC for consistent adapter and quality trimming
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper script to automate quality and adapter trimming as well as quality control, with added functionality for RRBS data.

tools.name: filter-fastq
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to filter FASTQ reads by identifier list
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility from Floor Lab to filter reads from a FASTQ file based on a provided list of identifiers.

tools.name: ssvQC
tools.one_line_profile: R package for quality control of enrichment-based NGS assays (ChIP-seq, ATAC-seq)
tools.detailed_description: A quality control tool designed for enrichment-based Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data, such as ChIP-seq, CUT&RUN, and ATAC-seq. It provides metrics and visualizations to assess the quality of sequencing libraries and enrichment efficiency.

tools.name: gps-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for processing Streptococcus pneumoniae sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline developed by the Global Pneumococcal Sequencing Project for processing raw FASTQ reads of Streptococcus pneumoniae. It handles read processing, quality control, and downstream analysis steps in a reproducible Nextflow workflow.

tools.name: dropSeqPipe
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for Single-Cell RNA-Seq pre-processing
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based workflow for the pre-processing of Single-Cell RNA-Seq data (Drop-Seq). It automates the steps from raw reads to expression matrices, including quality control, alignment, and quantification.

tools.name: TGSFilter
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-fast tool for filtering and trimming long sequencing reads
tools.detailed_description: An efficient C++ tool designed for the quality control of Third Generation Sequencing (TGS) long reads. It performs rapid filtering and trimming to remove low-quality data and adapters from long-read datasets.

tools.name: fastprop
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular property prediction framework using descriptor-based learning
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning tool for predicting molecular properties. It utilizes the mordredcommunity library for descriptor calculation and provides a fast, efficient interface for training models on chemical datasets, suitable for drug discovery and cheminformatics tasks.

tools.name: SumStatsRehab
tools.one_line_profile: Quality control tool for GWAS summary statistics files
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to perform quality control on GWAS summary statistics files, ensuring data integrity for downstream analysis.

tools.name: fastq-filter
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance FASTQ filtering program
tools.detailed_description: A fast, C-based command-line tool for filtering FASTQ files based on quality scores and other metrics, developed by LUMC.

tools.name: seqparse
tools.one_line_profile: Library for parsing biological sequence files and accession IDs
tools.detailed_description: A TypeScript library for parsing various sequence file formats (GenBank, FASTA, SnapGene, SBOL) and accession IDs into a common format, developed by Lattice Automation.

tools.name: AdapterRemoval
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid adapter trimming, identification, and read merging tool for NGS data
tools.detailed_description: AdapterRemoval v2 is a flexible tool for trimming adapter sequences from High-Throughput Sequencing (HTS) data. It handles both single-end and paired-end reads, performs quality trimming, and can merge overlapping paired-end reads into consensus sequences.

tools.name: MegaQC
tools.one_line_profile: Web application for aggregating and visualising MultiQC reports longitudinally
tools.detailed_description: MegaQC is a web-based platform designed to collect, store, and visualize data from multiple MultiQC runs. It enables longitudinal analysis of quality control metrics across different projects, samples, and time, facilitating system-wide performance monitoring.

tools.name: MultiQC
tools.one_line_profile: Aggregate bioinformatics analysis results into a single interactive report
tools.detailed_description: MultiQC searches a given directory for analysis logs and compiles a HTML report. It's a general use tool, perfect for summarizing the output from numerous bioinformatics tools (e.g., FastQC, Cutadapt, BWA, STAR) across many samples.

tools.name: MultiQC_SAV
tools.one_line_profile: MultiQC plugin for Illumina Sequencing Analysis Viewer (SAV) data
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for MultiQC that parses and visualizes InterOp metrics from Illumina sequencing runs, replicating plots and tables found in the Illumina Sequencing Analysis Viewer (SAV).

tools.name: MultiQC_bcbio
tools.one_line_profile: MultiQC plugin for the bcbio-nextgen pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for MultiQC that extends its functionality to parse and report specific metrics generated by the bcbio-nextgen bioinformatics analysis pipeline.

tools.name: ConFindr
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for detecting intra-species bacterial contamination in sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: ConFindr is a bioinformatics pipeline designed to detect contamination in bacterial next-generation sequencing (NGS) data. It works by identifying the presence of multiple alleles of core genes, allowing for the identification of intra-species contamination which is often missed by other tools.

tools.name: AfterQC
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic quality control, filtering, trimming, and error removal for FASTQ data
tools.detailed_description: AfterQC is a tool for automatic quality control of FASTQ data. It performs filtering, trimming, and error removal, and attempts to correct sequencing errors by analyzing overlapping paired-end reads. It generates HTML reports and is designed to be simple to use with minimal configuration.

tools.name: fastp
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-fast all-in-one FASTQ preprocessor for QC, trimming, and filtering
tools.detailed_description: fastp is an ultra-fast FASTQ preprocessor that provides comprehensive quality control, adapter trimming, quality filtering, per-read cutting, and splitting/merging functions. It is designed to be much faster than Trimmomatic or Cutadapt and produces JSON/HTML reports.

tools.name: fastplong
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing and quality control tool for long-read sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: fastplong is a tool derived from fastp, specifically optimized for long-read sequencing data (e.g., Nanopore, PacBio). It provides high-performance preprocessing, quality control, and filtering capabilities tailored to the characteristics of long reads.

tools.name: rnaseq-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq data processing pipeline for alignment and quantification
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive RNA-seq pipeline developed by Pavlidis Lab that handles raw sequence alignment and transcript/gene quantification, designed for reproducibility in gene expression analysis.

tools.name: SARS2seq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for SARS-CoV-2 genome consensus generation from targeted sequencing
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed to process raw FastQ data from targeted SARS-CoV-2 sequencing. It performs quality control, alignment, and generates biologically correct consensus sequences of the SARS-CoV-2 genome.

tools.name: ViroConstrictor
tools.one_line_profile: Viral amplicon-based sequencing pipeline for consensus generation
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to process raw FastQ data from viral amplicon-based sequencing (e.g., generic viral genomes) to generate biologically correct consensus sequences, developed by RIVM.

tools.name: grepq
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance FASTQ filtering tool using regex patterns
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool written in Rust designed to quickly filter FASTQ files by matching sequences against a set of regular expression patterns, offering high-speed processing for large sequencing datasets.

tools.name: NGSTroubleFinder
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for detecting contamination and kinship in human NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics tool for the detection and quantification of sample contamination and kinship relationships across human Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data, aiding in quality control and data integrity verification.

tools.name: SegataLab Preprocessing
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic reads pre-processing workflow for trimming and decontamination
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools and scripts from SegataLab for pre-processing raw metagenomic sequence reads, including adapter trimming, quality control, and removal of host contamination.

tools.name: FastQ Screen
tools.one_line_profile: Contamination screening tool for NGS data against multiple genomes
tools.detailed_description: A popular quality control tool that allows users to screen a library of sequences in FastQ format against a set of sequence databases so that the composition of the library can be assessed, useful for detecting contamination.

tools.name: NGS_data_processing
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Perl scripts for processing FASTA/FASTQ and table data
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit containing various Perl scripts for handling and processing Next-Generation Sequencing data formats (FASTA, FASTQ) and tabular data, providing utilities for format conversion and data manipulation.

tools.name: Fastq-to-BAM
tools.one_line_profile: Optimised pipeline for WGS data processing from FASTQ to BAM
tools.detailed_description: An optimised pipeline designed to process whole genome sequence data, converting FASTQ files to BAM format, specifically tailored for high-performance computing environments like NCI Gadi.

tools.name: FilterBanks_FastPythonImplementation
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Python implementation of filter banks for signal processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing efficient implementations of filter banks, which are essential for feature extraction and spectral analysis in signal processing and audio analysis tasks.

tools.name: smos
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing tools for SMOS soil moisture data
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for downloading, reading, and converting time series data from the SMOS (Soil Moisture and Ocean Salinity) satellite mission, facilitating earth science research.

tools.name: ve-sequence-parsers
tools.one_line_profile: Parsers for converting biological sequence formats to JSON
tools.detailed_description: A library to parse and convert various biological sequence formats (GenBank, FASTA, SBOL) into JSON format and vice versa, facilitating data interoperability in synthetic biology and bioinformatics.

tools.name: mpc_track_fastplanner
tools.one_line_profile: Nonlinear MPC tracking for omnidirectional mobile robots
tools.detailed_description: A control framework for omnidirectional mobile robots that utilizes nonlinear Model Predictive Control (MPC) to track local trajectories generated by a fast planner, applicable in robotics research.

tools.name: RiboSeq_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing RiboSeq FASTQ data
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed to process RiboSeq sequencing data, handling tasks from raw FASTQ files to downstream analysis formats.

tools.name: scCDC
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell contamination detection and correction tool
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool for detecting and correcting contamination in single-cell sequencing data, improving the quality of downstream analysis.

tools.name: FASTX-Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: A collection of command line tools for Short-Reads FASTA/FASTQ files preprocessing
tools.detailed_description: The FASTX-Toolkit is a collection of command line tools for Short-Reads FASTA/FASTQ files preprocessing. It performs tasks such as quality filtering, trimming, clipping adapters, and converting between formats, widely used in NGS data analysis pipelines.

tools.name: faster
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance tool for computing FASTQ file statistics and quality metrics
tools.detailed_description: Faster is a command-line tool written in Rust designed to rapidly calculate statistics and quality metrics for FASTQ files. It provides essential metadata and QC information efficiently, suitable for quick inspection of sequencing data.

tools.name: seqkit (Rust)
tools.one_line_profile: Rust-based toolkit for manipulating FASTA and SAM files
tools.detailed_description: A command-line toolkit written in Rust for processing and manipulating biological sequence files (FASTA) and alignment files (SAM), offering functionality for filtering, converting, and summarizing sequence data.

tools.name: hichipper
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing and QC pipeline for HiChIP data
tools.detailed_description: A data processing pipeline designed specifically for HiChIP data, handling restriction fragment processing, read mapping, and quality control to facilitate downstream chromatin conformation analysis.

tools.name: umi
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for processing Unique Molecular Identifiers (UMI) in sequencing reads
tools.detailed_description: A set of preprocessing tools for handling Unique Molecular Identifiers (UMIs) in NGS data, enabling accurate deduplication and error correction in sequencing reads.

tools.name: fastqc-viz
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for enhancing FastQC reports
tools.detailed_description: An R-based utility that provides a redesigned and enhanced visualization layer for standard FastQC reports, making quality control metrics easier to interpret.

tools.name: BBTools
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive suite of high-performance tools for DNA/RNA sequence analysis
tools.detailed_description: A suite of fast, multithreaded bioinformatics tools for genomics and transcriptomics, including the BBMap aligner, BBDuk for trimming/filtering, and numerous utilities for sequence manipulation and quality control.

tools.name: CpG_Me
tools.one_line_profile: WGBS pipeline for alignment and QC of DNA methylation data
tools.detailed_description: A Whole Genome Bisulfite Sequencing (WGBS) pipeline that automates the process from raw FastQ reads to CpG count matrices, incorporating alignment and quality control steps specifically for methylation analysis.
